entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions need to work with nullable-value-target-types #69447
    17.8
  • IDE features don't handle crefs to primary constructor parameters #69446
  • EditorConfig editor never works #69445
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Tab-completion of type name does not add required namespace #69442
  • [LSP] [Bug]: New line in or immediately below documentation comment does not break line correctly #69441
    18.0
  • dotnet build fails if consumer namespace prefix is same as referenced class with usings within namespace #69439
  • The .NET SDK has newer analyzers with version '7.0.4' than what version '7.0.3' of 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers' package provides. Update or remove this package reference. #69436

Closed

  • CS8987 is reported when using lang version < 11 and net7.0 target on scoped mismatch #67638
    17.8
  • Linux compilation fails in multi-user environments due to sharing same tmp folder when using source generation #68852
    17.8
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34009.245 #69450
  • Analyzer / generator shadow load directory needs to be per user on Unix #65415
    17.8
  • SemanticsModel.GetSynbolInfo throws a NullRefereceException for a particular symbol. #69434

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix resolving import completion item in LSP #69454
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new version of protocol to correctly serialize URIs #69453
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Share more code in the 'use collection expression' fixers #69452
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip AddImport calculation for source generated doc #69451
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not offer to convert spans to collection-expressions in .net7 and earlier. #69449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add test demonstrating how trivia is handled #69448
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid boxing when structs are used as collection keys. #69443
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Document and test `ref readonly` breaking change #69437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Bring VS Code telemetry reporting in DevKit to match log level requirements of VS #69444
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove positive Unary expressions to avoid confusion in addition #69257
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Support converting arrays, whose elements are assigned afterwards, to a collection expression. #69415
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with target type T[] or IEnumerable<T> #69355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux #69406
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add link to `ref readonly` feature branch #69435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Recommend 'using static' before a top-level statement #69346
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warnings for collection initializers #69307
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Soft-select "preselect" items if there's no filter text #69351
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use argument validation consistently in all SourceText implementations #69391
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
